example.text: Thanks to President Biden’s failed economic agenda, this is entirely predictable. Small businesses are struggling from inflation, supply chain bottlenecks, workforce shortages, and serious tax hikes in Biden’s budget. No wonder optimism has plummeted. [[url]]

Rising interest rates & inflation have increased costs for our farmers & prevented families in rural America from securing a mortgage. I’m proud to work w/ [[user]] to ensure our families & producers have access to the capital they need to thrive. [[url]]

Iowa is the second largest ag-exporting state in the nation, with much of our product going to China. Sitting on [[user]], I’m working with my colleagues and our producers back home to broker new trade deals and open new markets for #IA04 farmers. [[url]]

President Biden needs to catch a clue. [[user]] passed a responsible deficit reduction package that slashes $4.8 trillion in wasteful spending from the federal budget and protects American taxpayers. His unwillingness to negotiate is ridiculous. [[url]]

Thanks to President Biden’s failed economic agenda, this is entirely predictable. Small businesses are struggling from inflation, supply chain bottlenecks, workforce shortages, and serious tax hikes in Biden’s budget. No wonder optimism has plummeted. [[url]]

Iowa is the second largest ag-exporting state in the nation, with much of our product going to China. Sitting on [[user]], I’m working with my colleagues and our producers back home to broker new trade deals and open new markets for #IA04 farmers. [[url]]

Americans who have responsibly saved to buy a home should not be forced to foot the bill for somebody else’s mortgage. That’s why I cosponsored [[user]]’s Free Market Mortgage Act to repeal President Biden’s mortgage fee hike on responsible homeowners. [[url]]
